outputs.description: Allows EKS to manage clusters on your behalf.

data.mapRoles:
- rolearn: arn:aws:iam::894850187425:role/example-oidc-iam-sa-instanceRole-role-da25dab
  username: system:node:{{EC2PrivateDNSName}}
  groups:
    - system:bootstrappers
    - system:nodes

- rolearn: arn:aws:iam::894850187425:role/example-oidc-iam-sa-instanceRole-role-da25dab
  username: system:node:{{EC2PrivateDNSName}}
  groups:
    - system:bootstrappers
    - system:nodes

- rolearn: arn:aws:iam::894850187425:role/example-oidc-iam-sa-instanceRole-role-da25dab
  username: system:node:{{EC2PrivateDNSName}}
  groups:
    - system:bootstrappers
    - system:nodes
